Subject: build cantera 1.6 w/ visual studio?
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=204994144; y=-ZOdH8YnfoLWagAPBrQj8vFl9CGb71IEncFge92Oiwfl0Lxx0Q

   Tt was fabulous that version 1.5 included a Visual Studio .net 
solution file.  It made cantera fantastically easy to build from 
source.  It also included a compenent for building an installer.  
However, it doesn't look like version 1.6 has a solution file or a even 
win32 directory.  Are there any plans to include this helpful directory 
in the source code in cvs for current or future versions? 
    Thanks in advance,
    Rebecca
